## LightModel.isTextureUsed() method

Check if specified texture is being used

**Signature:**

```typescript
isTextureUsed(name: string): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  name | string | The texture name |

**Returns:**

boolean

true if the texture is being used
